name: X AI
description: What is the project about? X AI stands as a cornerstone in transforming AI Technology. X AI strives to create a strong foothold in the DeFi market by providing unique use cases. Its range of DeFi offerings sets it apart from other DeFi cryptocurrency ventures. Moreover, leveraging blockchain technology, the AI-generated NFTs are one-of-a-kind and cannot be duplicated, heightening their value and making them desirable to collectors and investors alike. What makes your project unique? 3 live products and more in development. X GPT (https://xai.cx/gpt) X GPT is an AI-powered chatbot designed specifically to help with Blockchain technology and Crypto. This chatbot can assist individuals, developers, and businesses with a wide range of tasks, including no-code smart-contract programming, debugging, market analysis, guidance, and trading. X GPT provides comprehensive aid so that anyone can easily access the blockchain and cryptocurrency markets. X AI Draw (https://xai.cx/draw) The ability to revolutionize the process of creating NFTs. Rather than relying on artists to produce unique digital art, generative art uses algorithms and code to create one-of-a-kind pieces. X AI applies this technique to the production of NFTs by feeding data, like images or videos, into an AI model. X Scanner (https://xai.cx/scanner) X Scanner assists users in detecting two of the most prevalent token scams: rug pulls and honeypots. As scammers develop more complex plans to commit fraud on DeFi, it has become harder to recognize scam tokens. History of your project. Developing AI technology and improvise on it, to create better images, response. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Continue develop on more AI tools, launch API access for Premium user. What can your token be used for? The token will be able to use for payment for premium api access or trading at DEX/CEX.
